column1: Table 19 - Estimated Resident Population By Geographical District and Sex - Republic Of Mauritius, 1990 - 2016 (Mid -Year Estimates )
(i) Figures from 1991 to1999 are based on 1990 Population Census
These figures will be different from table 1C as population by age group was not revised for these years
(ii) As from year 2011 the population estimates for Districts  are given according to new boundaries as amended and gazetted in the Local Government Act 2011
